title: Chou Tokkyuu Hikarian (Super Express Hikarian)
synopsis: Chou Tokkyuu Hikarian is about a series of bullet trains that are turned into robots. The robots, along with two humans named Tetsuyuki Shinbashi and Minayo Kanda, have to stop an alien invasion.
staff: [['Kanada, Yoshinori', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director']], ['Kuroda, Yousuke', ['Script']], ['Ooshiro, Tsutomu', ['Key Animation']], ['Hayashi, Yuzo', ['Music']]]
